caption.title: Location and subject.
caption.p: Images of NASD24 showing (A) the mummy wearing funerary dress in the coffin, (B) the childâ€™s mummified body prior to the autopsy, (C) the vesicopustular rash as evident on the facial features, and (D) this rash as evident on the arm. (E) Map displaying location of the Basilica of Saint Domenico Maggiore in Naples, Italy. The map of Italy was constructed in Matlab v2016b using the landareas.shp to define the outline of the landmass of Italy. The shapefile obtained from the Italian National Statistics Institute (ISTAT) ( http://www3.istat.it/dati/catalogo/20061102_00/) was used to define the Italian administrative borders as displayed within the inset focused on Naples and showing the exact location of San Domenico Maggiore (latitude = 40.849027, longitude = 14.254418).
